message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is about multilingual text classification, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses machine learning techniques such as Support Vector Machines, which are commonly used in the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The use of word embeddings and character n-grams also suggests that the paper may fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper's focus on classification suggests that it may also be relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
